mapper.update: update user set uname = #{uname},phone =#{phone},email = #{email} where id = #{id}
update user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}

select.if: SELECT u.id,zhanghao,uname,phone,email,c.id cid,c.name cname,c.`position`,sheng,city FROM USER u JOIN company c ON u.`id`=c.`userid` where u.id = #{id}
